commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bascc6b275"

diff:
"cc6b275 Bug 349122 - misc fallout from theme changes to tabs, toolkit/content part. r=mconnor.
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 066fb2f..041ec3d 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -2948,7 +2948,7 @@
        (see globalBindings.xml in Pinstripe for example).
   -->
   <binding id="tabbrowser-close-tab-button"
-           extends="chrome://global/content/bindings/toolbarbutton.xml#toolbarbutton">
+           extends="chrome://global/content/bindings/toolbarbutton.xml#toolbarbutton-image">
     <handlers>
       <handler event="command"><![CDATA[
         var bindingParent = document.getBindingParent(this);
"
